inn1.comm: One slip in. It lands outside off and tilts in a touch, pushed out to point region
lands well outside off and moves away further, the batsman thought about having a go but withdrew his bat at the last moment
the inswinger that Kula is famous for makes its entry, moves past the poke and hits the pad but clearly going down the leg side
shout for lbw .. Another inswinger. Fuller this time. It landed on the middle and off  and moved in to hit the pad. Would have just missed the leg stump. Rudi shakes his head
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
The inswinger this time .. the two-card trick is at work here , squeezed out to the on side..
on a length around middle, turned to square-leg for a single
Two slips in. It's a length delivery just outside off, shaping away, pushed out to covers
short in length, extra bounce on that as ever from Dilhara and Hamilton plays very well , stands up on his toes, gets on top of the bounce and punches it through cover point

ooh lovely delivery. He followed the short of length stuff with a fuller one. Hamilton was caught at the crease, surprised by the fuller length, and stumbled out at the last minute. No bat on ball.. It just missed the outside edge
full again, on the leg and middle, Hamilton loses balance in trying to whip it away and the ball rolls of the pad
yorker length on the middle stump line, just about dug out by Masakadza. Very interesting first over from Fernando
hurls this one short outside off and Hamilton watches it fly past him around chest-high
full in length on the middle stump line, pushed out to covers
pushes it wide down the leg side
turned away for a single
superb delivery .. in the zone outside off stump, and Masakadza is beaten on the drive .. this one straightened
leans forward to defend it to the off side
length delivery on the middle, punched back to the bowler
wide outside off stump .. tries to have a go but can't reach.
short in length, just outside off stump, defended to the off side of the pitch
gets forward to squeeze the full toss of the outside edge through point
on a length, just outside off, shapes away, tapped to left of backward point. Slight fumble there and Hamilton pushes Taylor for a quick single
banged in short around the off stump line, tapped to covers
fullish outside off stump, Hamilton goes for the off drive and edges it down to third man
sharp well directed bouncer and Taylor ducks and the ball flies over his head
length delivery around the off stump, pushed out to the off side of the pitch
cuts in from the off stump line, another good delivery,and hits the front thigh pad
full delivery just outside off stump, pushed back to the bowler
shuffles right across the stumps, gets outside off and flicks it to short midwicket

This was coming. Kulasekara has been harassing Hamilton with his two-card trick. In and out. Out and in. This one shapes away from short of length, Hamilton had stepped out, trying to counter the swing, but this one kicks up and cuts away. He had a poke at it and the ball took the outside edge. Gone!
beaten first up. Full delivery and this one straightens outside off and goes past the outside edge
on the off stump line, tapped to say short cover region ... Taibu thinks there is a single there, Taylor thinks only in your dreams and Taibu rushes back to safety
short in length, cuts away a touch, pushed out to point
short in length, just outside off stump, pushed out to covers. Great start this from Sri Lanka. Both the bowlers have been absolutely spot on

really full delivery, almost at the blockhole, jabbed out to the off side .. Fernando has been breathing fire and has bowled very intelligently as well. Full, short of length, the bouncer, the yorker ,.. the works
Taylor retreats further back inside the crease. He waits for Fernando to release. It's a full delivery outside off and Taylor leans forward at the last moment to square drive it through point
the bouncer on the middle stump line, flies over the batsman
short in length on the middle stump line, turned to the on side

length delivery on the middle stump line, another inswinger. Taibu was in trouble as he had presses his front leg too far across and couldn't get his bat around in time. The ball hit the pad but it was missing the leg stump
A short squarish short-leg moves in for this ball and Taibu turns it straight to him!
steps down the track and defends
gets this to straighten outside off stump, steered to backward point
moves in again and Taibu is ready this time, opens his stance, doesn't commit himself on the front foot and turns it to that shortish square-leg guy
full in length, moving into the leg and middle, rolls of the pad
in the zone outside off stump, Taibu covers his off stump and shoulders arms
fuller and on the leg and middle line and Taibu misses out on that .. the ball rolls away to square-leg.
short of length on the off stump line, Taylor stays back to defend
almost yorker length on the off, pushed out to extra cover
short in length outside off and Taibu guides to short backward point

shout for lbw Was there an inside edge? It moved in from outside off, tAylor was caught at the crease, tries to jab it to the on side and hits him on the back thigh in front of middle and off. Very close . Perhaps there was a nick on that. Only that could have saved him there I think. Perhaps it was a touch high. Was he saved by the height
And Taylor responds with an audacious on-the-up hit over covers.
stays back to work it to fine-leg
defends this one to the on side
moves down the track and forces Kula to shorten the length. He then calmly taps it between midwicket and mid-on for a single
short in length, straightens outside off, punched to left of mid-off
leans forward to turn it to the on side ..
It was a full toss around the off stump line, the attempted slower one going awry and Taylor whips it through midwicket

What a stunner from Samaraweera at Gully. It was a short of length delivery outside off and Taylor just opened his bat-face and tried to guide it to third man. The ball flew low to right of Samaraweera who swooped forward to take it inches of the turf. And boy is he delirious or what?! Big wicket this.
Ouch! Hit on the helmet. It was the bouncer, Ervine tries to duck but ducks right into the line of fire. The ball hit his front shoulder and rammed into his helmet
on the middle and leg, worked to square-leg
banged in short and it goes down the leg side
in the zone outside off stump line, Ervine pushes inside the line of the ball
just outside off stump, pushed to point
nice inswinger, from just outside off, defended on the front foot. Keeper is standing up and there is that short squarish short-leg for Taibu
yet another one that comes in, clipped wide of mid-on
in the channel outside off stump, left alone
in the zone outside off and Ervine covers his off stump and shoulders arms
Lovely delivery, this one straightens on the middle stump, trying to get an lbw decision,. Ervine stops his front-foot movement and gets the bat out to stab it to the on side
leans forward to drive on the up and Randiv makes a superb one-handed diving stop to his left at short cover. That would have gone to the boundary
tries the bouncer and Taibu pulls it for a single
banged in short but it sails down the leg side
in the zone outside off, left alone
kicks up from short of length and Ervine defends to the on side
gets forward to push it to point region
The bouncer just outside off stump and Taibu sways away
in the zone outside off, left alone
from round the stumps, length delivery moves in past the defensive prod and strikes the pad. Easily going down leg
ful and outside off stump and Ervine reaches out to play well away from his body and gets the edge. The ball flies to left of first slip where Samaraweera dives but can't reach
length delivery moves in from round the stumps, defended to the off side.
fuller and outside off, Ervine squeezes it past gully
moves in from outside off, turned to short squarish short leg that Kula has permanently placed for Taibu
lands on a length around off stump line, skids on, defended on the front foot
And again. 39 for 2 and the bowling -Powerplay is on
The off break this time and it spins away sharply. Left alone
carrom ball on the middle stump line, defended to the on side
The off break again now and Ervine pushes inside the line. The keeper collects
lands on a length outside off and skids away to the keeper. Tight first over.
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
short in length, mistimes the cut to the off side
length delivery that straightens outside off and Taibu is beaten on the square drive
Wide slip in. Full in length, just outside off, Taibu mistimes the drive back to the bowler
stays back, opens the bat-face and runs it down to third man
lands on a length just outside off and moves away. Ervine is slow in getting forward and across and is beaten on the attempted cover drive
tries the carrom ball but Taibu has already decided come what may I am going to sweep and he picks a single
The off break .. .. And Ervine can't connect with his sweep shot
the googly this time, loopy, slow and Ervine pushes it to short cover point for a quick single
stretches forward to play another sweep shot but the carrom ball cuts away. hits his glove and on to his body
And so, this time he plays the reverse sweep for a single!
run out shout on the pads, goes down, clipped to deep backward square-leg ... There is an appeal for run out but Ervine is home
length delivery outside off stump, pushed out towards point
full delivery and Taibu gets forward very quickly to blast it to the left of mid-off. Neatly done.

Ervine is run out It was pushed towards backward point and there is confusion between the two over the single. Taibu takes couple of steps down the track and Ervine rushes half-way. Taibu stops and turns. too late for Ervine who is unable to beat the throw which comes in to Angelo who breaks the stumps
leans forward to squeeze it to square-leg
full in length, just outside off, pushed to covers
outside off stump, mistimes the cut to point
plays the reverse sweep again and this time picks up two runs. The slip fielder moved to his right as soon as he saw Taibu shape for reverse but the ball well wide of him
plays the conventional sweep this time. Another couple of runs.
goes for the sweep shot again. Sweep. clean. sweep
leans forward to defend to the on side
on the middle stump line, it has been jabbed out to the on side

loud shout for lbw not given. Close. Very close. It was the loopy googly on middle and off and the batsman was trying to play the sweep shot. He missed and Mendis hit the pad. Looked very adjacent indeed. Hmmm It would have hit the leg and middle but ump Tiffin doesn't agree
plays the pull shot for a single
homing in on the off stump, defended to the on side of the pitch
full in length, pushed towards mid-on for a quick single
waits for the length delivery to arrive before wristing it through the on side
full in length, around off, driven to covers
gets forward to nudge it
One slip in. spins in from outside off, pushed to cover point for a quick single
fetches it from outside off and paddles it to short fine-leg region
turns in to the middle and leg, stabbed away by Taibu

turns in to the middle, Taibu dabs it close on the leg side, towards square-leg and they go for the quick single .. The throw misses the stumps and the cover-fielder couldn't back it .. and it runs away to the boundary
leans forward to push it wide of mid-on for a single
floated full, pushed out to the on side
short in length, clipped past square-leg
around the off stump line, run down to third man
banged in short and Lamb top edges the pull shot but it lands safely beyond square-leg
back of length outside off, cut to backward point
short in length, punched to the off side for a single .. Hold on Dilshan's throw misses the stumps and goes towards midwicket .and they take the extra run
gets forward to defend to covers
clips it past square-leg f
leans across to defend to the off side
floated full on the middle and off line, turned towards deep midwicket
quicker, just outside off, nudged to short midwicket
leans forward to turn it from around off stump past square-leg
carrom ball on the off and middle line, swept away for a single
on the middle stump line, pushed to the on side
the off break from short of length, forced away past square-leg
stretches forward to sweep it away for yet another single. Taibu's fav shot against Mendis is the sweep
on the middle stump line, turned to the on side
lovely carrom ball, it cuts away past the defensive poke .. not all that far from taking the edge
floated outside off stump, pushed to short extra cover
Taibu takes the aerial route. It was flighted outside off stump and Taibu stretches across to lift it over covers. Full swing of the bat
gets forward to dab it to short midwicket
Fab hit. Another flighted off break outside off and Taibu lifts it over wide mid-off this time. Shot!
goes back to turn it past square-leg
on the leg and middle, dabbed to leg gully
gets forward to work this past square-leg
tries the carrom ball, ends up as a full toss and Taibu plays the sweep shot again
the googly on the leg and middle line, turned behind square-leg
slow loopy full toss, the attempted googly, and Taibu sweeps it to deep square-leg region for couple of runs
knowing Taibu was about to sweep, Mendis slips in the really full carrom ball ... Taibu adjusts, changes his shot and manages to defend it
the full off break this time and Taibu goes for the sweep again but misses and is struck on the pad. Shout for lbw but it struck him outside the off stump
gets forward to defend to the on side
lands full outside leg stump, swept to fine-leg region
almost caught by the keeper down the leg side lands outside leg stump, Taibu pushes at it and edges it .. the keeper moves quickly to leg but couldn't hold on .. very tough
gets back to push it to the on side
short in length, turns in , Taibu tries to pull but is hit on the body
leans forward to dab it to midwicket
full in length on the off and middle, defended to the off side
the carrom ball on the off and middle, paddled away to fine-leg
Another sweep from Taibu but this time straight to backward square-leg
low full toss on the middle, swept away this time for a single
really full delivery, whipped to straightish midwicket
full in length, on driven to long-on for a single
on the middle and leg, sliding in from around off, punched to long-on
goes back and punches the leg break to long-off
lovely leg break.. slower through the air, lands on  a length around middle and off and spins past the defensive poke
slightly short in length, cut away to sweeper cover
again spinning away from back of length ,cut past point
just outside off stump, turns in, pushed towards non striker
slower, on the middle and leg, clipped to right of midwicket
on the middle and leg line, turned to fine-leg

Lamb is almost run out It was pushed to the on side and got deflected towards mid-off .. Taibu then calls Lamb for a single and there is a direct hit at the striker's end but Lamb has just about managed to drag his bat in.  And that's Taibu's 50. Very well crafted knock
leans forward to turn it to midwicket
stays back to work it to the on side
leans forward to drive to long-on
turns from the leg and middle line , Taibu shapes to defend and it runs of the inside edge
gets forward to push the leg break to the off side
flighted leg break outside leg stump, swept away for a single
full on the leg and middle, Lamb tries to on drive and gets a leading edge to extra cover
stretches forward to defend the leg break
He leans forward and plays the reverse sweep and gets the ball over backward point .. and it runs away to the boundary
lands around leg and middle and goes past the attempted sweep
tossed outside off stump, driven past the diving Dilshan to long-off
leans well forward to drive to long-off
skips down the track and whips the flighted off break over Kapugedera at short midwicket .. Just over..
straightens outside off, Taibu backs away to cut
shapes for the paddle sweep and edges it on to his pad and the ball rolls away to short fine-leg . perhaps there was no bat on it .. but it struck him outside the line of off stump
leans s forward to push it to the on side
And there is that favourite sweep shot of his again. Another couple of runs
slightly short and he cuts it for a single
on the off and middle, driven down to long-on
clears his front foot and sweeps from off and middle to deep square-leg region
on the leg and middle, turned straight to short midwicket
from round the stumps now, just outside off, defended on the front foot
goes well back to deflect it to short fine-leg fielder
presses back to work it through the on side for a single
leans forward to push it left of Taibu and Randiv makes a diving stop
moves down the track and on drives but again Randiv intercepts
topspinner from round the stumps, defended back to the bowler
on the leg stump line, swept away for a single.
on the off stump line, driven back to Jeevan
turns from middle and leg, wristed past square-leg
stays back to clip the leg break to midwicket
full toss, swept to deep square-leg region for couple of runs
backs away to cut to short cover
moves down the track and whips it to deep midwicket.
gets down the track but Randiv shortens the length.. jabbed to the on side
fetches it from outside off and yes you guessed it right plays the sweep shot
Lamb tries to play the sweep but can't connect .. it was a ball well outside off
leans forward to tickle the off break just past square-leg and by the time the short fine-leg could get across, they run two!
turns in to the middle and leg, from round the stumps, flicked to short fine-leg
full in length on the middle and leg line, Taibu plays a lovely bottom-hand powered pick-up flick shot over square-leg
cuts in from the middle, tapped close on the off side . say silly point region and off they go
Thwack. It was a short ball on the leg and middle line, Lamb plays a fine pull shot.
Fernando tries another short one .. and Lamb pulls again

Almost like Taylor. Weak shot. It was a short delivery outside off and Taibu almost guided it straight, tapped it straight, to backward point. What a soft dismissal. What a fine knock, though. He led Zimbabwe's revival
The bouncer on the leg side .. Wide.. Careful Fernando careful. Don't lose the plot now!
full and straight and he immediately finds the inside edge .. the ball rolls of the pad to the off side
leans forward to turn it to short midwicket
from round the stumps, lands outside off, the batsman goes for the sweep and is hit on the pad
fetches this from outside off and sweeps it to deep midwicket
topspinner from round the stumps, defended on the back foot
floated just outside off and Elton plays the forward defensive
beaten by the toppie. It landed on a length and skidded away with the angle, from round the stumps, Elton was trying to punch it to covers. ..
turns away from the middle and off line, punched to long-on
turns this one past midwicket
turns from the middle line, pushed towards non striker
outside leg stump line and Lamb clears the front foot and sweeps it for a single
lands on leg and middle, turns to middle , nudged to short midwicket
spins away from the off stump, plays the square drive and the ball squirts to left of backward point where a fine diving stop is done
goes right back to clip the off break past square-leg
from round the stumps, on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
shout for lbw It landed on the middle and leg and just about straightened. Elton was going for the sweep shot ... Replays show it was a very good shout. It would have hit the middle stump line ..
gets back to work it wide of midwicket
leans forward to on drive to long-on
leans forward to drive to long-on
turns away from the off stump, jabbed to covers
slightly short in length and Elton cuts to deep backward point
leans forward to drive it back to the bowler
lands outside leg stump and Elton sweeps it fine . Ajantha Mendis makes a fine sliding stop near the boundary
flighted full, on driven to long-on
Tickets please here! Mendis flicks it full on a length and Elton chips it tamely to covers. And Zimbabwe continue to wobble
leans forward to squeeze it to square-leg
googly on the middle stump line, eased past square-leg
just outside off stump, full in length, paddled to fine-leg
gets forward to play to the on side and gets a leading edge through mid-off
lands on the leg and middle, cuts towards middle, turned past square-leg
just outside off stump, driven to long-off
on the leg stump line, turned to short midwicket
leans forward to work it past square-leg
Clatter! Jeevan has nailed Lamb. It landed on the middle stump line and turned. Lamb went for the big slog sweep but no wood on leather. It was leather on the wood. Gone!
leans forward to work it to midwicket
slightly short and it has been forced away to long-off
the carrom ball .. too good for the batsman . it cuts away past the outside edge
googly outside off stump, steered through cover point

Ooh . what a lovely carrom ball and how it didn't get a wicket .. It cut away from the middle stump line, completely square-ed up the batsman, caught the outside edge and went right between keeper and first slip
Mendis drops it short this time and Coventry goes back to punch it sweetly through extra cover. Superbly timed.
leans forward to turn it to short midwicket
fuller, on the middle, pushed down to long-on
floated on the middle, driven towards the non striker  and Mendis makes a fine diving stop
slightly short in length and the aggressive Coventry rocks back to play a very fine cut shot. there wasn't much width there but he pulled it off
But he is gone now! Again looking to be aggressive, he went down the track and heaved it straight to long-on! 200 looks a long way from here
leans well forward to defend to the off side
short in length, on the middle, paddled away
lands on the middle and leg, googly, brushes the pad and goes to the keeper
from round the stumps, on the middle and leg, turned past square-leg
on the off stump line, defended to the off side
top spinner from round the stumps, on the off stump line, stabbed to the off side
moves down the track and drives past the non striker
another topspiner from round the stumps. They have had trouble in picking that toppie from Randiv today. The batsman just about manages to jab it away
goes on with the arm on the middle and off line, pushed to cover point
on the middle and leg, flicked past square-leg
fullish, on the legs, flicked to deep backward square-leg
short in length and it tails down the leg side
full in length around off, pushed towards covers for a quick single .. The non striker had slipped but recovered to get across. The throw misses the stumps at the striker's end .Had it hit ..
The death rattle! Full in length, fast, and tilts in to move past the waft, hits the pad and clips the stumps!
on a length on the middle, pushed back down the track
on the middle stump, carrom ball, runs of the inner edge to short midwicket
on the middle and leg line, turned past square-leg
another carrom ball, again too good .. Price has no clue, pushes out at it and is beaten
And he is gone now. Full delivery on the middle, the googly this time, Price shovels it straight to short midwicket. And then they were one.
stretches well forward to defend
breaks back in from the off stump line and hits the stretched foot but too high
around off stump line, pushed to cover point
short in length, straightens, turned to square-leg
almost yorker length, just outside off, dug out to the off side
another yorker length, stabbed out to the off side
length delivery on the off stump line, pushed out to point
Yet another yorker, Superb stuff, stabbed of the inner edge to left of the keeper but they run for the single
fetches it from just outside off and sweeps it for a single
carrom ball, from the leg stump line, turned past square-leg
the googly from the off stump, swept away for a single
backs away to cut through covers
really full delivery, driven inside-out through covers
They don't get to 200. It was pushed to right of short midwicket and they go for the run. Dilshan swoops in, fires a low through to Chandimal who breaks the stumps

inn2.comm: takes a couple of steps down the track and then pulls the short delivery
Wallop. Dilshan takes the length delivery from middle and leg and whips it through midwicket. He will try to cash in against the seamers
on the pads, turned to midwicket
length delivery that straightens on the middle stump line, defended back down the track
on the middle, tilting in, pushed to the on side of the pitch and Mpofu lunges across to make the stop
What an effort from Taibu It was a short delivery and Dilshan top edged it behind the keeper. Taibu dashed off at great speed and even threw in a desperate dive but couldn't get to to the ball.
full pitched from round the stumps, pushed to cover point for a single
Thrash. Fullish delivery just outside off and Dilshan creams it to point boundary. Fierce square drive
short in length, cut down to third man placed very wide
length delivery outside off stump, not short enough for the cut shot but Tharanga tries nevertheless and the ball rolls away to point
slips to the pads this time and that should have been put away. All he needed to do was to get some bat on it but he shall pick up couple of leg byes
full in length, pushed out to point
in the zone outside off, Dilshan places his bat inside the line and allows it to go through
length delivery outside off, driven on the up to left of covers where its stopped
fuller, straighter, pushed to mid-off
slower one, short in length, just outside off, chopped to backward point
short outside off stump and Dilshan goes for the pull and drags it from well outside off to mid-on .
Lashed away. He tried to slip in the slower one but dragged it short and wide, Dilshan waited before slapping it to the point boundary
from round the stumps, wide down the leg side
fullish delivery outside off stump, driven straight to mid-off placed wide .. Another opportunity missed by Tharanga.
And he now tries to manufacture something out of nothing and nearly loses his wicket. It was a good length delivery this time and he tried knife it on the up and is beaten
slightly slower, on the off, dragged to mid-on
on the off stump line, length delivery, defended to the on side
homing in on the off stump, pushed to short extra cover
Edged to third man boundary. It was a length delivery that straightened outside off. Tharanga tried to go on the up and it flew of the edge to left of the first slip
Boom! A short delivery just outside off and Dilshan swiveled to pull it to the square-leg boundary
Loverly off drive. Dilshan leaned forward and hit it on the up and to the left of the bowler. Superbly timed.
bouncer on the leg and middle stump line, Dilshan goes for the big hook but the ball flies over his left shoulder
full in length on the middle, pushed to the off side
length delivery on the off stump line, pushed to covers
fullish around off stump line, Dilshan leans forward and across, opens the bat-face and square drives through cover point
Bosh! Full length delivery and Tharanga lifts it over mid-on
fuller, on the middle and off line, driven to the bowler who deflects it to short extra cover
Tharanga charges down the track. Elton bangs it in short and Tharanga flat-bats it high over mid-on
leans forward to ease the full length delivery to mid-off
back of length, just outside off, cut to backward point
length delivery homing in on the middle stump line, driven to mid-off
on the middle stump line, pushed to Price who stops an glares at Dilshan
lovely delivery ... it turned from the middle stump and caught the edge but no slip in place! Price lets out a cry of agony
goes down his knee and sweeps it really fine past the short fine-leg fielder.
on the middle and leg line, clipped to square-leg
flighted full outside off, driven to long-on
arm ball on the off and middle, Dilshan goes back to punch it to covers
Shot! Tharanga went down on his knee and unfurled a neat square drive. It was a very full delivery outside off stump
driven to the covers this time
oh gorgeous .. he glided forward and timed it straight past the bowler .. long-on comes across to cut it
the slow bouncer and it sails high over Dilshan
leans forward, taps the ball slightly wide of midwicket, looks at Tharanga who responds. Dilshan reaches the other end and turns to applaud Tharanga for the run
short in length, outside off, cut hard to backward point ... awkward  bounce for Cremer who is hurt tryi ng to field. The physio is out there to treat the knee
length delivery outside off, Tharanga mistimes it to mid-off
goes for the sweep and drags it to short fine-leg
on the leg and middle line, turned to right of short fine-leg
on the off stump line, pushed to covers
Fab hit. Dilshan charges down the track and crashes it to the straight boundary
on the middle, pushed to covers
gets forward to push it to the on side of the pitch
backs away outside leg and tries to heave it over covers but makes no contact .. the ball goes past the off stump

Shot! length delivery outside off and Tharanga manages to pierce the packed off-side field .. He drove on the up and along the ground through extra cover where Coventry dives and takes some pace of the ball
leans forward to drive to mid-off
on the off stump line, pushed out to short extra cover
Whiplash! It was a length delivery outside off and Tharanga lifts it over point
short in length, just outside off, cut to point
very short delivery, pulled to deep square-leg
just outside off stump, left alone
lands on the middle, grips and turns.. squeezed out to the off side.. Good delivery that
Slip in place. Just outside off, and Tharanga rocks back to play a quality cut shot. It wasn't all that short, it wasn't  all that far away from the off stump but he has managed to play a neat shot
turns to the off stump iine, defended towards point
leans forward to defend back down the track
on the leg and middle, pushed to short midwicket
slower, fuller, on the middle, driven to long-off
just outside off stump, pushed out to point
Flamboyant whack! He sashayed down the track and lifted inside-out over extra cover
slows up the pace further.  floats it on the middle, tapped to square-leg
quicker, on the leg stump line, keeps the strike with a dab to square-leg
turns in to the middle and leg, edged to the off side
Oh a gift .. it was spinning down the leg side and all that Dilshan had to do was to get bat on it and he obliged.
And again but this time Dilshan misses out on an easy four
on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
on the off stump line, full in length, Dilshan is late in getting forward and stabs it away in the end
spins to the pads, turned to left of short fine-leg
leans forward to deflect it wide of midwicket
on the off and middle line, driven down to long-on
on the middle stump line, punched to long-off
flighted delivery, dips on Tharanga who leans forward to on drive to long-on
quicker, on the middle, eased to long-off
drags it short and Tharanga pulls to deep midwicket
gets forward, pushes to left of cover and wants a single to retain the strike but Tharanga says its too risky boss, please to get back
short in length and Tharanga cuts to right of point where Mpofu makes a diving stop
flighted on the middle, eased to long-on
stays back to clip it past square-leg
stretches forward to defend
on the legs, turned to the on side
just outside off, full in length, chopped away to backward point
Big turn there. It landed just outside leg and spun across to the off side! Dilshan watched it like ..--------   ask Arun lal to fill in the blanks ..
slightly short and DIlshan cuts past point
leans forward to off drive to long-off
leans forward to defend to the off side
turns in from outside off, pushed back to the bowler
takes it from the off stump line and paddles it away for couple of runs
short in length, outside off, cut to deep point
Fabulicious! .Tharanga rushes down the track and lofts the off break over long-on .Dilshan shows his appreciation for  the shot
goes back to force it past the bowler
Ah! nice .. Full delivery outside off, Dilshan rocks back to late cut it through vacant slip region
leans forward to defend
on the middle and off line, worked to midwicket
gets behind the line and defends
flighted outside off, driven to mid-off
Tharanga goes down the track, reaches to fetch the googly and smashes it over extra cover.  on 49 now
And this time it's his fifty. He goes back to turn it past square-leg. The players stand up in the dressing room and applaud
on the middle and off line, leans forward to defend
drifts to outside leg and Dilshan sweeps it hard to the boundary
leans forward to turn it to straightish midwicket
pushes this to short extra cover
backs away to cut it through point for a single
leans forward to push it to extra cover
and works it to long leg
on the middle and leg, pushed to the bowler
fullish, on the leg and middle, turned wide of midwicket
short in length and just outside off, Tharanga pressed back, opened the bat-face and slashes it through the vacant slip region .
short of length and this time guided to backward point
on a length, on the middle, defended to the on side
back of length, just outside off, run down to third man
slower one, punched to backward point where Cremer stops .. the ball slips from his hand and he doesn't know where it went but recovers
on the middle stump line, on driven to long-on
leans forward to drive to long-on
Clubbed. It was a short delivery and he pressed back, opened his stance and pulled it to wide long-on region
moves forward to drive it back to Utseya
rushes down the track, gets outside leg and drives hard to long-off
on the off stump line, eased gently towards long-off
short in length, around off, run down to third man
from round the stumps, short delivery, pulled away
short and wide, Dilshan reaches out to cut it past backward point
Blasted! Dilshan drills the length delivery past the bowler and to the straight boundary
high bouncer and Tiffin extends his arms
slower one, outside off, Dilshan mistimes the drive to covers. He then suggests he should have swung it over mid-on!
another slower one, around the off stump line, tapped to backward point
on the off stump line, pushed to short extra cover
moves down the track and drives hard but straight to short extra cover
presses back to cut it to deep backward point
flighted on the leg and middle line and Tharanga swings it to the midwicket boundary. They are doing it in style here
goes back to cut it past point
gets down the track and drives to long-on
just outside off stump, Dilshan cuts wide of third man
full delivery on middle and Dilshan goes for the paddle sweep and edges it to his pad ..
full again, goes for the big off drive and ends up dragging it to long-on
leans forward to drive to right of long-off
fullish, on middle and off and DIlshan caresses it through extra cover. Superbly timed. No violence. he just concentrated on getting the timing and placement right. 150 up for Sri Lanka
around the off stump line, cut to backward point
spins down the leg side ..
on the middle, pushed back to Price
turns in from outside off, Tharanga is cramped .,, jabbed away to the off side
on the off stump line, worked to short midwicket
on the middle stump line, driven to long-off
gets forward and retains the strike with a drive past Dilshan
gets forward to drive to the off side
Fab hit. It was a length delivery and just outside off but Dilshan manages to play a lovely cut shot
just outside off stump, tries to late cut but mises
on the middle stump, pushed to the on side

Dear o dear .. what have they done? Tharanga is run out He sacrificed for his captain. It was pushed to short third man and DIlshan runs across. Tharanga stops after couple of steps but Dilshan keeps running. And Tharanga decides to sacrifice himself and crosses over. Hmmm. Dilshan seems to angry with himself.
leans forward to defend
leans forward to turn it toward square-leg for a single
on the off stump line, pushed to the bowler
full and on the middle, Chandimal stabs it to the off side
moves down the track and chips it just short of the diving mid-off
goes back to punch it to long-on
flighted on middle and leg, turns and gets the leading edge to covers
short of length, pulled past square-leg
on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
on the off and middle, tapped to short midwicket
leans forward to push it towards non-striker
spins in, worked to square-leg
on the off stump line, wristed to backward square-leg
leans forward to defend
on the middle stump line, cut past point
on the leg stump line, swept away for a single
leans forward to defend to midwicket
presses back to cut left of covers where Ervine dives to make a half-stop
goes right back to clip it to fine-leg
short delivery, pulled away but straight to deep backward square-leg fielder
quickish, worked to short midwicket
flighted delivery outside off, Chandimal rushes down the track for the lofted shot but doesn't connect properly but clears covers
turns in to the off and middle, dabbed to the on side
leans forward to defend
fuller, pushed towards mid-off
full delivery on the off stump line, driven hard but can't beat the cover fielder
turns away from Dilshan who taps it to short third man
lighted on the middle, driven to covers
stays back to work it towards mid-on . by the time deep midwicket and long-on could get in, he turned for the second run
goes for the sweep but hits it straight to short fine-leg
leans forward to defend back down the track
gets down the track to ping long-on
turns in from outside off, Dilshan goes back to wrist it towards deep midwicket.
on the middle, swept to short fine-leg
full, just outside off, tapped to cover point for a single
the young man rotates the strike back with an on drive
on the middle and leg, clipped towards deep midwicket, again hit gently enough so that he has the time to come back for the second run
flighted on the off stump line, eased back to the bowler
skips down the track and drives with the turn to deep cover
rocks back to cut to point where Elton intercepts
shorter this time and Dilshan cuts to deep point
leans forward and gets a leading edge on the drive .. through mid-off
leans forward to defend the leg break to the off side
leans forward to defend to the off side
a long hop arrives and Chandimal pulls it to the boundary
turns in from outside off, squeezed to square-leg
Dilshan's seventh ODI ton and his first against ZImbabwe. First as a captain of course. It was slightly short in length and Dilshan went back to cut it to backward point boundary
quicker, Dilshan tries to swing it over square-leg but misses . the ball rolls of the pad
wide down the leg side. Just six more now
drops it slightly short and Dilshan retains the strike with a cut shot
short in length and it has been pulled away
leans forward to caress it through the off side. the scores are level
turns outside off and Dilshan cuts for couple of runs

Cremer tries to surpris DIlshan with a bouncer, yes a bouncer!, and Dilshan responds with a pull to fine-leg boundary! Congrats Sri Lanka.They win by 9 wickets. Comprehensive. Wonderful tournament for Dilshan who has got back to form in style. A fine tournament for Zimbabwe as well.
